name: tool_releases
schema:
CREATE TABLE `tool_releases` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`tool_id` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`version` text NOT NULL,
	`release_date` integer,
	`release_notes` text,
	`download_url` text,
	`sha256` text,
	`platforms` text,
	`is_latest` integer DEFAULT false,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`tool_id`) REFERENCES `tools`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
